name: Wanypie.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
I am Hyewon Jang (hwjang@seas.harvard.edu), education researchers in Mazur group of the Harvard university. 
Here is the list of my ongoing projects with co-authors and previous studies.

On-going projects

1. Identifying important STEM competencies using data of workplace
2. Educational backgrounds and pathways in solving ill-structured problems
3. Optimize team formation
4. Optimize the effects of collaborative exams

Previous projects

1. The linkage between cognitive skills and education
2. The return to skills in Korea:2000-2012
3. Peer instruction in science museum

### Here is my profile
http://blog.naver.com/hyewonjang/120205285141

### Here is the Korean blog that illustrates my personal thoughts 
http://blog.naver.com/hyewonjang

### Twitter
http://twitter.com/wanypie

### Interest
Educational data, Predictive analysis, Linkage between education and required skills in labor market
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
